title: Remove photo upload and replace gallery with 6 Ghibli-style couple images (storybook birthday surprise)

requirements.text: Remove the photo upload option from the existing Photos section so visitors can no longer upload images from their device.

quotes: okay remove the upload photo option and include many ghibi images like me and her

acceptanceCriteria: The upload card/CTA ("Add More Photos") is no longer rendered in the Photos section UI.
The hidden <input type="file"> and related upload handler logic are removed or unused.
The Photos section no longer imports or renders the Upload icon from lucide-react.

requirements.text: Replace the current preloaded photo list with 6 new static, Ghibli-style couple images (studying on a laptop; biscuits & tea; gym workouts; dancing joyfully; riding a bike together; heart within us) and ensure the slider displays these images.

quotes:
1.one image should be both are studing by laptop
2.eating biscut and tea
3.doing gym workouts
4.dancing jollyly
5riding in bike both together
6.one image shows heart within us

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/content/preloadedPhotos.ts is updated to reference exactly 6 image paths under /assets/generated/ for the new Ghibli-style images.
The Photos section initializes its gallery from the updated preloaded photo list and shows the 6 images in the slider with navigation/thumbnails.
No references to the existing WhatsApp preloaded JPEG filenames remain in preloadedPhotos.ts.

requirements.text: Add a cohesive, creative "Ghibli storybook birthday surprise" presentation across the Photos section (and its heading) using English user-facing text, while keeping the existing app structure (hero → messages → photos).

quotes: include your cretivity to surprice her like pro birthday surpriser

acceptanceCriteria: The Photos section heading in frontend/src/App.tsx is updated to an English, storybook-themed title (not "Our Memories Together").
The Photos section includes light storybook-like framing (e.g., caption/chapter feel, gentle decorative styling) without introducing new data entry or upload features.
All new/updated user-facing text is in English.

requirements.text: Add the 6 newly generated images as static frontend assets and reference them directly from the frontend (do not serve images through the backend).
acceptanceCriteria: All 6 new images exist as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated/ with the exact filenames specified in the image requirements.
The app references the images via absolute paths like /assets/generated/<filename>.png.
No backend code is added/required to fetch or serve these images.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not edit frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; no new backend services or databases.
nonGoals: Do not add Internet Identity login or any authentication changes.
Do not add new upload features elsewhere in the app.
Do not add real-time features (chat, websockets) or external API integrations.
